pr_title: Run Intellij inspections on the common module

timeline.message:
Run Intellij inspections on the common module

Code cleanups include:

- Use diamond operator
- Remove redundant fields in annotations
- Use static inner class when possible for memory
- Use method reference for lambdas
- Replace string "UTF-8" with StandardCharsets.UTF_8
- Remove unecessary variables that store result that we immediately
  return
- Use Java style array declaration rather than C style

timeline.bodyText: Should configure IDEA to add newline at end of file (Editor > General > Ensure an empty line at the end of the file on Save) or add .editorconfig to do it automatically.
timeline.author: dwalluck
